title: 4 Essential Steps for Building Authentic Relationships with Patients
author: Questex Partner
description: By Eric Peacock | Pharma marketers, media agency strategists, and medical affairs executives frequently ask what the key is to our success building authentic relationships with patients facing chronic conditions. Read about the four simple, but often skipped, steps we follow in order to build authentic relationships that will last.
